sentences.en: Poultry company personnel and growers must any contact with live bird markets and noncommercial poultry.
sentences.cn: 禽业公司人员和饲养员必须避免接触活鸟市场和非营业性禽类.

sentences.en: Taxi driver: News about current affairs, documentaries, music, movies, noncommercial ads and so on.
sentences.cn: 出租车司机: 实事新闻 、 纪录片 、 音乐 、 电影和公益广告等等.

sentences.en: This MV is for noncommercial purposes and are intended for personal use only!
sentences.cn: 这支MV是为非商业性目的,是为个人使用目的只!

sentences.cn: 本博客采用“署名-非商业性使用 - 禁止演绎2.5中国大陆”许可协议授权.

trans.tran_en: not of, connected with, or involved in commerce
